comments.body: OK, just confirming that there are 2 additional config files needed to fully specify the style rules to enforce? what do these additional configs support beyond PEP8?

comments.body:
This file is to automatically configure editors that have the "editorconfig" plugin to configure 2 spaces tab for scala files and 4 spaces tab on Python files. It is not related to pep8, so can be submitted in another PR if you prefer.

That's why I would prefer to be placed on the root of the project (and not the root of the python folder)
